attributes.action: To build a New Look and Primark in Solihull Town Centre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We'd like to build a New Look and primark in Solihull town Centre (Touchwood)as it would mean a lot less traveling to other towns/cities to go to these shops.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
